alternatives.name: Tutanota
alternatives.desc: Tutanota is an encrypted email and calendar service, based in Germany.

alternatives.name: ProtonMail
alternatives.desc: ProtonMail is a Swiss-based email service, with no advertising and maximum possible privacy for its users.

alternatives.name: Posteo
alternatives.desc: Posteo is an email service, with no advertising.

alternatives.name: Fastmail
alternatives.desc: Fastmail is an Australian company that offers private email, funded entirely by its users.

alternatives.name: Soverin
alternatives.desc: Soverin hosts privacy-oriented email and website, based in the Netherlands.

alternatives.name: Thexyz
alternatives.desc: Thexyz is a Canadian company, offering privacy-conscious business email.

alternatives.name: Kolab Now
alternatives.desc: Kolab Now is a Swiss email provider with lots of extra services, aimed at business people.

alternatives.name: mailbox.org
alternatives.desc: Run by a German family business, mailbox.org offers email, online file storage and online office features.

alternatives.name: Signal
alternatives.desc: Signal is a popular private messaging, voice call, and video call service.

alternatives.name: XMPP
alternatives.desc: XMPP is a widely-used free and open internet messaging standard.

alternatives.name: Quicksy
alternatives.desc: Quicksy is an easy-to-use chat app.

alternatives.name: Zom
alternatives.desc: Zom is an extremely easy to use and free open source messenger app.

alternatives.name: Matrix / Element
alternatives.desc: An open network for secure, decentralized communication.

alternatives.name: Jami
alternatives.desc: Jami is a libre, easy-to-use alternative to Skype, with voice call, video call, and messaging.
